name: erALTVeq1i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(werALTV(c0, c1), werALTV(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(werALTV(c0, c1), werALTV(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wb(werALTV(c0, c1), werALTV(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(werALTV(c0, c1), werALTV(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c0, c2)
-| wi(wceq(c0, c2), wb(werALTV(c0, c1), werALTV(c2, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c2), wb(werALTV(c0, c1), werALTV(c2, c1)))

-| wceq(c0, c2)

comment: Equality theorem for equivalence relation on domain quotient, inference version. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 25-Sep-2021.)
